name: SimpleMMO WEB APP Dark Style
description: Dark-ish style for new SimpleMMO WEB APP (web.simple-mmo.com) that miss Dark Mode function for now. Contact me for bug reports and suggestions: t.me/archmrn or pm me in game.
additional_info:
v1.4
Bugfixes and improvements

v1.3
Bugfixes and improvements

v1.2
1. Removed unnecessary borders in tables
2. Styled inbox and messages
3. Other minor fixed and improvements

v1.1
1. Fixes and improvements
2. Styled guild-related areas

v1.0a
1. Fixes and improvements
2. Fixed tabs with character stats and currency

v1.0 Initial release
Almost all areas were styled, fixed some stuff and added some features like sticky header for fast navigation while scrolling long pages and increased size of fonts
